reviews.review: Freeman shall be remembered as the Valve's finest.

#RemeberFreeman

I was there along with many others to clearly state that we shall never Forget about Freeman
I finally beat the game it was good
Timeless! Enjoying to play even though it's older than me. Played it again today because of #RememberFreeman ! <3
Good game I just wish the Cop npcs weren't so weak

I've played this game since the early 2000's. We had no internet back then so this record breaker event may as well be my very first time playing in online deathmatch. I even held top spot for a good 10 minutes in a full 32 player server and I recorded all of it. It's a nice memorabilia for experiencing what I've been missing out back then.

#Rememberfreeman

Let this be a marked day in history to remember one of the greatest games of all time.

#RememberFreeman gang

(i played the crack life mod)

10/10

An amazing classic, gives a lot of nostalgia as well. I'm not the biggest FPS genre fan, but I'm always down to play some good ol' Half-Life (along with some other Valve games).

I did do the mistake of installing the source version at first, which was buggy as hell. I do not recommend it at all, unless you like screwing yourself over and getting stuck in a lot of sections.

#RememberFreeman 
Brought this game yesterday after getting a decent PC and love it :D
look at all the concurrent players it has, it must be quite the great game

This game alone beats the shit out of most games nowadays.
